title: Login screen not appearing then pc freezes.
body: Alright, so right now whenever i start up league i get to the launch screen and then i click launch. At this point the launch scree disappears, but the login screen never shows up and when i click on anything or i try to bring up the task manager my whole computer freezes. I'm running windows 10 and i'm not sure if this is stems from the anniversary update (i believe i fixed that freezing issue) or if its lol itself causing my pc to freeze. If ya'll need the specs for my computer i can give them to you, but i've been running league for over 6 months without an issue till now.

replies.body:
When your client is having issues staying connected to our servers, it can cause your PC to freeze. I suspect this is happening to you, so I recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with League by working through our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
